thread.title: 1 hurt after small plane goes off runway - Massachusetts news
thread.title_full: 1 hurt after small plane goes off runway - Massachusetts news

author: boston.com
title: 1 hurt after small plane goes off runway - Massachusetts news
text:
WORCESTER, Mass. (AP) â€” The pilot of a small plane has been taken to a hospital with serious injuries after the aircraft went off the runway while attempting to take off from Worcester Regional Airport.
Fire officials say the plane ended up in the woods after the crash shortly before 8 a.m. on Saturday.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below There was no fire after the crash.
The pilot, who was the only person aboard, was brought to UMass Medical Center.
No other details were immediately available.
